name: tslint-no-redundant-jsdoc-annotations
description: Tslint rule that disallows declaring JSDoc @tags that can be expressed by the TypeScript surface syntax.

scripts-info.release: Builds and preps files for release. Will bump version and output CHANGELOG, but will not commit changes.
scripts-info.release:dry: Release dry-run. Will emulate CHANGELOG and tag changes, and create a tarball.
scripts-info.release:prep: Copies and cleans-up relevant files for publishing. Note that this `package.json` is set to `private` to avoid accidental release. On the release prep, the `package.json` will be cleaned up for public release.
scripts-info.pretest: Runs a build step before testing.

scripts.release: standard-version && npm run build && npm run release:prep
scripts.release:dry: standard-version --dry-run && npm run build && npm run release:prep && npm pack dist/
scripts.release:prep: cp README.md dist && cat package.json | node tools/prepare-package.js > dist/package.json

author: Emilio Martinez-Cordero <e.marticor@gmail.com>
